definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: The ellipsis is the punctuation mark (…) that indicates an intentional omission.
sentences.chinese: 省略號表示的是作者蓄意的省略。

sentences.english: Here I need to put a long series of ellipsis so I account for no details.
sentences.chinese: 後來就是一長串的省略號，就不細說了。

sentences.english: Avoid lazy text-inspired speak, with overuse of dot-dot-dot’s and consecutive commas.
sentences.chinese: 過多使用省略號和連續逗號。

sentences.english: They pull on the river left a string of footprints, it was wayfarers ellipsis of life.
sentences.chinese: 縴夫在河邊留下一串腳印，那是跋涉者生活的省略號。

sentences.english: You no doubt noticed the ellipsis in the code above.
sentences.chinese: 您一定注意到上述代碼中的省略號。

sentences.english: The elipses in the middle represent a bunch more matches.
sentences.chinese: 中間的省略號表示了一批更多的匹配。

sentences.english: Truncates text that does not fit in the rectangle and adds ellipsis.
sentences.chinese: 截斷無法放入矩形框的文本並添加省略號。

definition: Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to do one's best/to shape up/to behave/to fend for oneself/you're on your own
to be an irksome presence (i.e. sth or sb one wishes were not there)
